title: Bert Just Asked Us A Question That Could Forever Change Our Friendships
description:
The Mega Millions lottery pot is up to $1 billion! If you won, what would you do with that life-changing money? We have a few ideas, but Bert is about to make it uncomfortable in the studio.
If we won, how much money would we give to one another?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
